title: Cakes
details: Our cakes bring layers of joy (and rich buttercream frosting) to any occasion, with flavors for every type of sweets-lover. From classics to limited-time creations, all of our beautifully decorated cakes are made the old-fashioned way: from scratch and with love.

title: Cupcakes
details: The cupcakes that made Bake n Cake famous around the city. Adorned with our signature buttercream swirl, each of our cupcakes is made from scratch using the finest ingredients.

title: Cookies
details: Don’t get caught with an empty cookie jar. Our selection of small-batch-baked cookies has something for everyone, from chocolate chunk to confetti.

title: Brownies & Bars
details: I make my bake-sale bestsellers in small batches and from top-shelf ingredients, just the way Mom made ‘em—perhaps even better? Either way, our selection of brownies and bars can’t be beat.

title: Icebox Desserts
details: Cool off with our no-bake pies, bars, and our signature icebox cake, layered with rich chocolate wafers and whipped cream.

title: Cheesecakes
details: A classic dessert melding decadent cream cheese filling and cookie crust to make a deliciously-rich bite.
